snippet: A federal judge struck down the state’s ban on same-sex marriage on Tuesday, though the ruling was temporarily delayed and it was not clear when same-sex couples could be issued marriage licenses.
abstract: Federal Judge John G Heyburn strikes down Kentucky's ban on same-sex marriage, though ruling is temporarily delayed and it is not clear when same-sex couples can be issued marriage licenses.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge struck down the state’s ban on same-sex marriage on Tuesday, though the ruling was temporarily delayed and it was not clear when same-sex couples could be issued marriage licenses.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
